plan_overview: This learning plan guides you through foundational and advanced DSP concepts by exploring active noise control, advanced signal processing techniques in optical communications, and data-driven modeling for industrial systems. Starting with the principles and applications of active noise control provides a practical DSP context. Then, you will deepen your understanding with subband processing and deep learning methods for digital backpropagation. Finally, you will explore the creation of digital twins using DSP for industrial brownfield plants, linking DSP with system modeling and automation.

reading_order.why_first: This paper introduces fundamental DSP concepts through the practical application of active noise control, providing historical context and current advances essential for understanding DSP's role in real-world systems.
key_questions: What are the core DSP techniques used in active noise control?
How have digital signal processors enabled advances in ANC?
What are the main challenges in implementing ANC systems?
reading_order.paper_title:
Active Noise Control in The New Century: The Role and Prospect of Signal
  Processing

reading_order.why_first: Building on foundational DSP knowledge, this paper explores advanced subband processing and deep learning techniques for digital backpropagation, illustrating modern algorithmic innovations in DSP.
key_questions: How does subband processing reduce complexity in digital backpropagation?
What role does deep learning play in enhancing DSP performance?
How is signal-to-noise ratio improved using these methods?
reading_order.paper_title:
Wideband Time-Domain Digital Backpropagation via Subband Processing and
  Deep Learning

reading_order.why_first: This paper applies DSP concepts to industrial system modeling, showing how data-driven approaches create digital twins, thus expanding DSP applications beyond traditional signal processing into system automation and control.
key_questions: How is DSP used to process data for digital twin creation?
What types of data are essential for modeling brownfield plants?
How do digital twins support system reconfiguration and optimization?
reading_order.paper_title: Automated data-driven creation of the Digital Twin of a brownfield plant

actions.label: Summarize ANC DSP Techniques
actions.how_to: Read paper 2306.01425 and write a summary of key DSP methods used in active noise control, including their practical applications and challenges.
actions.expected_outcome: A concise document outlining DSP fundamentals and ANC applications.

actions.label: Implement Subband DSP Algorithm
actions.how_to: Study paper 1807.01545, then implement a simplified subband processing algorithm for digital backpropagation in a simulation environment.
actions.expected_outcome: Working code demonstrating subband DSP and performance evaluation against linear equalization.

actions.label: Analyze Digital Twin Data Processing
actions.how_to: Review paper 2209.08821 and extract the DSP techniques used for data-driven digital twin creation; prepare a report on data types and processing workflows.
actions.expected_outcome: Detailed report linking DSP methods to industrial digital twin modeling.

actions.label: Integrate Learnings in a Case Study
actions.how_to: Combine insights from all papers to design a conceptual DSP-based system for noise control and monitoring in an industrial plant using digital twin concepts.
actions.expected_outcome: A project proposal or presentation illustrating integrated DSP applications.

metrics: Number of DSP techniques correctly identified and summarized
Accuracy and efficiency of implemented subband DSP algorithm
Depth of analysis in digital twin data processing report
Quality and coherence of integrated DSP system design

timeline_weeks.focus: Understand DSP fundamentals via active noise control
timeline_weeks.deliverable: Summary document of ANC DSP techniques

timeline_weeks.focus: Learn and implement subband processing and deep learning DSP methods
Analyze DSP applications in digital twin creation for industrial plants
timeline_weeks.deliverable: Analytical report on data-driven DSP methods

timeline_weeks.focus: Synthesize knowledge into an integrated DSP application case study
Review and refine all deliverables based on feedback

risks.risk: Limited practical implementation details in papers may hinder hands-on coding exercises.
risks.mitigation: Supplement with external DSP tutorials and simulation tools to support implementation.

risks.risk: The digital twin paper focuses on system modeling which may require additional domain knowledge beyond DSP.
risks.mitigation: Focus on DSP-related data processing aspects and consult domain experts if needed.

_topics_suggestion: The selected papers may also cover research areas including: Applied Machine Learning, Deep Learning Architectures, General Algorithms. You may gain a broader understand of the field by exploring these related research directions
